summary:
This is a beta version of a mod i'm working on. What this mod does is tweaks the animations of Skyrim to look (in my opinion) better than the default animations.

[VERSION FEATURES]

[----.25Beta----]
? One Handed Idle Animation Tweak
? Two Handed Idle Animation Tweak
? Bow Held Idle Animation Tweak
descriptionHtml:
[color=Yellow][size=6]Track this mod to be notified when it updates[/size][/color]
[url=http://darkwolfmodding.wix.com/darkwolfmodding]Check out my website[/url]
[size=5]Contact Me:
[Twitter] (I will post my status on mod updates and upcoming mods here so follow me on twitter)
[url=https://twitter.com/DarkWolfModding]DarkWolfModding[/url]
[/size]

[center][size=5][color=Gold][VIDEOS][/size][/color][/center]
Version .25 Beta Demonstration
[youtube]A1nXKQ7fQiM[/youtube]

[size=5][color=Gold][MOD NAME][/size][/color]
[size=4]Animation Tweaks[/size]

[size=5][color=Gold][VERSION][/size][/color]
[size=4].25B[/size]

[size=5][color=Gold][DESCRIPTION][/size][/color]
[size=4]This is a beta version of a mod im working on. What this mod does is tweaks the animations of skyrim to look (in my opinion) better than the default animations.

[color=Orange]LOOK AT THE IMAGES[/color][/size]

[size=5][color=Gold][VERSION FEATURES][/size][/color]
[size=4]
[----.25Beta----]
? One Handed Idle Animation Tweak
? Two Handed Idle Animation Tweak
? Bow Held Idle Animation Tweak[/size]

[size=5][color=gold][INCOMPATIBILITIES][/size][/color]
[size=4]This mod is incompatible with mods that change the following files:
[?] 1hm_idle.hkx
[?] 2hm_idle.hkx
[?] bow_idleheld.hkx

PS: .hkx files are the compiled animation files that Skyrim uses for the animations
[/size]

[size=5][color=gold][COMPATIBILITY][/size][/color]
[size=4]Should work with any mod that doesn't change the animations that are in this mod. (Check the Incompatibilities section for a list of all the animations this mod changes.)[/size]
[size=5][color=Gold][FUTURE VERSION UPDATES][/size][/color]
[size=4]
[----.25----]
? Magic Idle Animation Tweaks[/size]


[size=5][color=Gold][INSTALLATION][/size][/color]
[size=4]Put the "Meshes" Folder into your skyrim Data Folder

For 64Bit:
C:Program Files (x86)SteamSteamAppscommonSkyrimData

For 32Bit:
C:Program FilesSteamSteamAppscommonSkyrimData[/size]

[size=5][color=Gold][UNINSTALLATION][/size][/color]
[size=4]Remove the following files from the below directories:

64Bit:
C:Program Files (x86)SteamSteamAppscommonSkyrimDataMeshesactorscharacteranimations

32Bit:
C:Program FilesSteamSteamAppscommonSkyrimDataMeshesactorscharacteranimations

? 1hm_idle.hkx
? 2hm_idle.hkx
? bow_idleheld.hkx
[/size]
author: DarkWolfModding
